off.$description: Track background color when switch is off (unchecked)

on.$description: Track background color when switch is on (checked). Uses accent primary for status indication.

disabled.$description: Track background color when switch is disabled

disabledOn.$description: Track background color when switch is disabled and on

off.$description: Track border color when switch is off (unchecked). One step darker than background (neutral.300) for subtle definition. Lighter than secondary button border.

on.$description: Track border color when switch is on (checked). Transparent when on.

disabled.$description: Track border color when switch is disabled
Thumb background color when switch is disabled. Transparent with border for subtle disabled appearance.
Thumb border color when switch is disabled. Light border for visibility on transparent background.
